description: The vessel's name (based on what it declared in its pre-arrival notification submission), as returned from the MDH API response.
The vessel's callsign (based on what it declared in its pre-arrival notification submission), as returned from the MDH API response.
The vessel's IMO number (based on what it declared in its pre-arrival notification submission), as returned from the MDH API response.
The vessel's country flag (2-letter country code, based on what it declared in its pre-arrival notification submission), as returned from the MDH API response.
The vessel's due to arrive time (based on what it declared in its pre-arrival notification submission), as returned from the MDH API response.
The location within Singapore waters from where the vessel is expected to arrive into, as returned from the MDH API response.
The location that the vessel is expected to head to after arriving within Singapore waters, as returned from the MDH API response.
The datetime that the data was first fetched from the MDH API.
